EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.STL Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at SpringOne Tour St. Louis!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
We look forward to seeing you at SpringOne Tour St. Louis tomorrow. Please review the event details here <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/st-louis]]> and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Location: Eric P. Newman Education Center 320 S Euclid Ave, St. Louis, MO 63110
Directions: Parking: If you are driving, the 2 closest garages are the Euclid Garage and the Metro Parking Garage (map <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/11HxBL-TeFmL2WeapzPF8SQ1sHcgxXGWj/view?usp=sharing]]>). Both garages have a daily rate of $15. The Metro Parking Garage is located at the corner of Taylor Avenue. Please utilize levels 6-7 of the garage, go to level 3 to enter into the pedestrian walkway. Press handicap button to open the door. Turn left into the walkway. Make the first right (past Kaldi’s Coffee). Walk a short distance, and you will enter EPNEC at the 2nd level.
Public Transport: The closest bus station to the venue is Central West End/Metro Garage Bus Station. The closest train station is the Central West End stop. More information on Metro Transit Centers can be found here <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5Z_2cBSiBMOaHp3VUIyd0h2T0lESndrTmJGWWpxdE5Bd1A4/view?usp=sharing]]>.
Thanks, Tasha Isenberg
